page.title: 07The Church, Upper Clatford
page.content: The vicar of{All Saints Church,} Upper Clatford, is Rev. Michael Tristram. Since his induction in April 1985 he has conducted 2 weddings 4 funerals and 5 christenings. Between 20 and 30 families go to church. There are 15 people on the Parochial Church Council. There is a rota of 20 'Holy Dusters' who clean the church. The choir has 15 members. The vicar is the choirmaster. The organist Mr. Smith, is blind. There are 15 children in the Sunday School which takes place during the morning service. Bell Ringers practise on alternate Fridays. 12 Ringers take it in turns to ring the 6 bells. The church is very active and organises: Music and Drama club, Confirmation classes, Youth club, 18-Plus club and Bible Study group.
